title: A Special Afternoon in Omotesando
description: Elegant cafes and afternoon tea spots in the Omotesando area, perfect for a break between shopping. Discover places where you can spend a special afternoon in a splendid setting.
content:
# A Special Afternoon in Omotesando

Discover high-quality cafes where you can unwind during your shopping spree in Omotesando. We introduce establishments that will craft a special afternoon moment for you with their splendid ambiance and delectable sweets.

## A Health-Conscious Chocolate Tea Specialty Store

<Place id="ChIJXWjqENONGGARoHDEGIixqVA" />
Located just a 2-minute walk from Omotesando Station, this is a specialty store for chocolate drinks that are gentle on your body. Situated in the same building as Panasonic Beauty Salon, it features a menu designed with beauty and health in mind. Their unique drinks, combining chocolate and tea, such as Amazake Chocolata and Chocolat Orange, are highly praised for their refreshing and easy-to-drink quality. With both terrace and counter seating, it offers a space where you can relax while taking in views of the Omotesando streets. The staff provide courteous service, and their thoughtful gestures, like offering a luggage rack, make this a truly delightful place to visit.

## Seasonal and Splendid Afternoon Tea

<Place id="ChIJN1d2azWNGGARRnsy-dt3NJQ" />
If you're looking to spend a special afternoon in Omotesando, this afternoon tea specialty shop comes highly recommended. Opened in 2023 as their second branch after Nakameguro, its luxurious concept, where the interior floral decorations, tableware, and entire menu change with each season and theme, has become quite a talking point. The splendid dessert stand, featuring seasonal ingredients like peaches and antique roses, is complemented by a substantial selection of savories, including Kuroge Wagyu steak and abalone soup. Another delightful highlight is the unlimited refills of black tea and fruit tea. They even offer a service where staff act like photographers to capture your memories, making it a perfect spot for anniversaries and girls' gatherings.

## A Refined Omotesando Experience

Indulge in a splendid and refined cafe experience that perfectly matches the sophisticated atmosphere of Omotesando. A stop here during your shopping will allow you to savor a special afternoon moment, unlike any other.
